ol.li: From Setup, enter Connected Apps in the Quick Find.
In the Permitted Users dropdown, select admin-approved users are pre-authorized.
Click OK to accept the security warning. You will satisfy the requirements in the following steps.
Scroll down the page and select Manage Profiles or Manage Permission Sets (depending on how you will manage Conga Orchestrate access).
Choose the profiles or permission sets that have access to Conga Orchestrate. You can only add custom (non-managed) permission sets.
